ValidationRule.description: Further Explanation under Participant Feedback is Required to fill-in when any one of the Answers selected is 'Neutral' 'Disagree' or 'Strongly Disagree'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( Further_Explanation__c ='' , (OR ( ISPICKVAL(Answer1__c , 'Neutral'), ISPICKVAL(Answer1__c , 'Disagree'), ISPICKVAL(Answer1__c , 'Strongly Disagree'), ISPICKVAL(Answer2__c , 'Neutral'), ISPICKVAL(Answer2__c , 'Disagree'), ISPICKVAL(Answer2__c , 'Strongly Disagree'), ISPICKVAL(Answer3__c , 'Neutral'), ISPICKVAL(Answer3__c , 'Disagree'), ISPICKVAL(Answer3__c , 'Strongly Disagree') )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Fill-in the ‘Further Explanation’ in Participant Feedback Section since one of your Answers were ‘Neutral’ or ‘Disagree’ or ‘Strongly Disagree’
